## Load in a dataset
```{r}
litters_data = read.csv(file = "./FAS_litters.csv")
litters_data = janitor:: clean_names(litters_data)
```

## Load in 2nd dataset
```{r}
pups_data = read.csv(file = "./FAS_pups.csv")
pups_data = janitor::clean_names(pups_data)
```
